alert.note: Alert for Motherlode; Northern San Joaquin Valley; Southern Sacramento Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 08 at 1:53PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Sacramento, northeastern San Joaquin, northern Stanislaus, southwestern El Dorado, southwestern Calaveras and southwestern Amador Counties through 215 PM PST... At 149 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms east of Elk Grove south to near Linden, moving northeast around 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail along with heavy rain. Brief funnel clouds are also possible with this line of thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ione, Rancho Murieta, Valley Springs, Campo Seco, Latrobe, Rancho Calaveras, Rancho Seco Park, Camanche Reservoir, Wallace, Forest Home, Sheldon, Milton, Farmington, Sloughhouse, Camanche Village, Vineyard, Wilton, Carbondale, Linden and Lockeford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Motherlode; Northern San Joaquin Valley; Southern Sacramento Valley
